Package MOBLIMA.dataStructure

Class Showtime

java.lang.Object
MOBLIMA.dataStructure.Showtime
public class Showtime extends Object
Represents a showtime of an assigned cinema. Each showtime has a seating availability that can be edited based on moviegoers' bookings

    • addSeating

      public void addSeating(int row, int column) throws IOException
      Books the indicated seat for this Showtime. Saves the changesS into the showtime database
      Parameters:
      row - This Showtime's seats' row to be booked.
      column - This Showtime's seats' column to be booked.
      Throws:
      IOException
